title: @Riot, What about a dodge token for Ranked? Like ARAM reroll tokens.
body:
It'd have to be designed so that the number of games to get one would be really high, to avoid everyone from dodging all the time.
Allows players to avoid playing a full game with a toxic player, who threatens to lose the match for the team.
Just an idea. 
What do guys think?

replies.body: They pretty much have that already. The first dodge each day is only -3 LP (which is essentially nothing) and a 5 minute wait. The system is already fine for people who don't dodge very often, and is already set up to allow for the occasional dodge if you get a toxic player/have to leave/dc in champ select.

I didn't know that, interesting.
My idea was to avoid the entire 'losing LP' experience though.
Thanks for the info.
